name: Gold-Blocks
description:
Relaxing Jump-And-Climb Game

A game designed to help you clear your head.

Most productive week of your life

Using this game as a tool to systematically relax your mind. You can experience the most productive week of your life.
Learn more about that method at: http://www.julius-eckert.com/gold-blocks

Climbing & Collecting

You will climb and explore a randomly generated cave. You start at the bottom and work your way up. 

On the way, there is lots of gold to collect. Try and get it all.

Jump too late

If you jump a little too late, because your brain was not quiet fast enough (not planning ahead enough).
You will not fall. You will still jump.

This eliminates one of the biggest sources of frustration with Jump-and-Run games.

Anti-Rogue-Like

Once you are alive, you will never die.
There is no fall damage.
You will find no enemies.
Everything is designed to minimize frustration.

Explore a million levels

The caves you explore are randomly generated. You can play a different cave every time. Or you can play the same cave over and over again. Every cave has a unique name (seed). If you find a cool one you can share it with your friends (just tell them the name).

Simple Graphics

Most games have detailed, highly animated and exciting graphics. A problem, if you want your brain to relax.

This game uses simple shapes and few colors.

Improve your score

Once you have finished relaxing. The game has a challenging side as well.
You can speed-run caves, trying to get to the top fast.
Or you can try to collect as much gold as possible.
